Class User

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.lab1.maria.wyganowska.gameoflife.model.User
public class User extends Object
Class which manages the information given by a user

1.0
Author:
Maria Wyganowska

    • validateInput

      public void validateInput(int maxChoice, int minChoice)
      Method which validates whether the input entered by the user is an actual option in a menu
      Parameters:
      maxChoice - The maximum number that can be selected in a menu
      minChoice - The minimum number that can be selected in a menu
